issue.title: Missing field in BE list view
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

List view of perimeters (SHOP):
The field checked_out_time is missing in SQL query used to build the list of perimeters.

List view of layers group (MAP):
Fields checked_out and checked_out_time are missing from the SQL statement

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.1
